definition: to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Although he passed away, he was able to experience his greatest wish.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他去世了，但他終能實現他最大的願望。

sentences.english: Barack Obama says his 86-year-old grandmother has died.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克奧巴馬錶示他86歲的祖母去世了。

sentences.english: Andys mother, also died because of the raw xiao Ming.
sentences.chinese: 安迪的母親也是因爲生小明而去世。

sentences.english: After his mother’s death, Anselm took to travelling.
sentences.chinese: 母親去世後，安瑟倫開始了他的旅行。

sentences.english: Sheldon: You know, when my grandfather died.
sentences.chinese: 你也知道，我外公去世以後。

sentences.english: He expressed condolence for his loved dog.
sentences.chinese: 他爲愛狗的去世表示哀悼。

sentences.english: He had all but completed 2666 when he died.
sentences.chinese: 去世前他完成了《2666》的寫作。

sentences.english: After five years and four children, Gilbert died.
sentences.chinese: 五年Gilbert去世，他們共育有四子。

sentences.english: Sometimes, only one person is missing, and the whole world seems depopulated.
sentences.chinese: 有時，不過是一個人的去世，卻似乎是全世界的損失。

sentences.english: Her husband's death heartbroke her greatly.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫的去世讓她悲痛欲絕。

sentences.english: His death was announced by the University of Utah in Salt Lake City, where Dr.
sentences.chinese: 鹽湖城猶他大學宣佈了科爾夫博士去世的消息。

sentences.english: I was surprised at the news about his death.
sentences.chinese: 他去世的消息令我感到震驚。

sentences.english: Medical treatment failed and the old man went off last night.
sentences.chinese: 那位老人因醫治無效於昨晩去世了。

sentences.english: He died in the relatively new Ouachita Hospital, where Mother worked.
sentences.chinese: 他是在比較新型的沃希塔醫院去世。

definition: to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
to live to the (ripe) age of
lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise/fig. to pass away (idiom)
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
to die/to depart from the world forever
to die/to depart this mortal coil
